name: Xm Software Solutions Pvt Ltd
description:
XM Software Solutions Private Limited, aims to deliver business excellence, supported through a complete suite of shared services.
Incorporated in the year 2006 under the laws of India, we provide extended support services to our associate companies of the UAE Exchange Group.
We have evolved into a shared services centre, offering a wide range of multi-functional expertise that are designed to provide integrated, innovative solutions for business meeting the operational and technology needs of our associate companies world-wide.
The engine that drives our growth and performance is made up of our people. This strong group of 700 plus nurtured and empowered talent are based across different centres of excellence in India, serving our associate companies worldwide.
What sets us apart from our contemporaries is our passion for service excellence, innovative solutions, portfolio of best practices, thorough understanding of scalability, quality of execution and commitment to consistent customer delight.
These continue to be the key drivers of success in our progressive journey so far.
